snippet: With Tom Brady set to become the second quarterback to start five Super Bowls, The Fifth Down is comparing his body of work to some of the greatest performers in the game that decides it all. Third up: Terry Bradshaw.
abstract: With Tom Brady set to become the second quarterback to start five Super Bowls, The Fifth Down is comparing his body of work to some of the greatest performers in the game that decides it all. Third up: Terry Bradshaw.

headline.main: The QB Files: Tom Brady vs. Terry Bradshaw
